item.title: Report X-2024080686
item.description:
Report X-2024080686

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-12T15:14:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-08
  • City: ROGERS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Damaged package had been repacked at STPL 0552 by Nathan Olssen on 8/7. Package currently has no declaration. Driver discovered it leaking while out on delivery route today and coded it a 10, bringing it back to the station. Tracking ID has an ORM-D service code on it, and I recognize the product as UN1791 from past packages.
